translation.sentence:
**HELP** Hi {name}, welcome to the Telegram Price Bot. Here is the list of supported commands.
/help : show this message /alive : show if bot is active /set_test_mode __true/false__ : enable/disable test mode /is_test_mode : show if test mode is enabled /price_get_single __COIN_ID COIN_VS LAST_DAYS [SAME_MSG]__ : show chart and price information of the specified pair (single call) /price_task_start __PERIOD_HOURS COIN_ID COIN_VS LAST_DAYS__ : start a price task in the current chat /price_task_stop __COIN_ID COIN_VS__ : stop the specified price task in the current chat /price_task_stop_all : stop all price tasks in the current chat /price_task_pause __COIN_ID COIN_VS__ : pause the specified price task in the current chat /price_task_resume __COIN_ID COIN_VS__ : resume the specified price task in the current chat /price_task_send_in_same_msg __COIN_ID COIN_VS true/false__ : enable/disable sending chart and price information in the same message for the specified price task in the current chat /price_task_delete_last_msg __COIN_ID COIN_VS true/false__ : enable/disable the deletion of last messages for the specified price task in the current chat /price_task_info : show the list of active price tasks in the current chat
Parameters in square brakets are optional.
**STATUS** ✅ The bot is alive.
**TEST MODE** ✅ Test mode enabled.
**TEST MODE** ✅ Test mode disabled.
**TEST MODE** Test mode is currently enabled.
**TEST MODE** Test mode is currently disabled.

**TASK CONTROL** ✅ Price task successfully started.
Parameters: - Period: __{period}h__ - Coin ID: __{coin_id}__ - Coin VS: __{coin_vs}__ - Last days: __{last_days}__
**TASK CONTROL** ✅ Price task [{coin_id}, {coin_vs}] successfully stopped.
**TASK CONTROL** ✅ All price tasks successfully stopped.
**TASK CONTROL** ✅ Price task [{coin_id}, {coin_vs}] successfully paused.
**TASK CONTROL** ✅ Price task [{coin_id}, {coin_vs}] successfully resumed.
**TASK CONTROL** ✅ Price task [{coin_id}, {coin_vs}] send chart/price in the same message set to: {flag}.
**TASK CONTROL** ✅ Price task [{coin_id}, {coin_vs}] delete last message set to: {flag}.
**PRICE TASKS INFO** Number of active tasks in this chat: **{tasks_num}** Tasks list: {tasks_list}
**PRICE TASKS INFO** No task is active in this chat.
**ERROR** ❌ An error occurred while executing command.
**ERROR** ❌ You are not authorized to use the command.
**ERROR** ❌ This command can be executed only in the chat group.
**ERROR** ❌ API error for coin {coin_id}/{coin_vs}, check network or coin ID.
**ERROR** ❌ Invalid parameters.
**ERROR** ❌ Price task [{coin_id}, {coin_vs}] is already active in this chat. Stop the task to start a new one with the same coins again.
**ERROR** ❌ Price task [{coin_id}, {coin_vs}] is not active in this chat.
**ERROR** ❌ Period shall be between 1 and 24.
**ERROR** ❌ Maximum number of tasks reached. Stop some tasks to start new ones.
- Coin: __{coin_id}/{coin_vs}__, period: __{period}h__, last days: __{last_days}__, state: __{state}__
